Description.Text: The Villa’s wellness centre is surrounded by tropical gardens and also features a fitness centre with new Technogym equipment. In-room massages and treatments are also available.
It's located in Mazzarò Bay, Taormina.The hotel is in front of the cable car to Taormina old town.The A18 motorway and Taormina-Giardini Naxos Station are a 5-minute drive away.
Amzing historic building,the hotel is surrounded by a beautiful garden and facing Bay of Mazzaro.
Restaurant Oliviero serves Sicilian cuisine and fresh seafood on its beautiful terrace with panoramic views of the Bay of Mazzaro.
Beautinful and in line with a 5 star Hotel.
